12c (12.2.1.4.0)

Package oracle.adf.view.rich.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuildInfo
    The BuildInfo provides information pertaining to the version of dependancies in use.
    CalendarActivityRamp
    CalendarActivityRamp is a subclass of InstanceStyles Class that takes a color ramp and returns the appropriate styles for the calendar skinning keys passed in.
    CalendarSkinInstanceStyles
    The CalendarSkinInstanceStyles class is a way to provide per instance styling of calendar activity based on marker CSS classes.
    DateCustomizer
    The DateCustomizer class allows customization of dates such as formatting dates to Strings.
    DateTimeUtils
    Provides utilities for processing Date objects.
    FacesMessageUtils
    Simple class used to create BLAF+ Confirmation Type messages.
    InstanceStyles
    The InstanceStyles class is a way to provide per instance styles based on skinning keys
    LoggerUtils  
    Marker  
    MarkerUtils  
    ProviderComparator
    The ProviderComparator class allows to sort activities according to the order induced by the implemented comparator.
    ResetUtils
    Provides utilities for resetting
    SerializationUtils
    This set of utility class will help us out with various types of serialization tasks..
    SoftReferenceCache<T>
    This is a thread safe cache who's implementation is based on a SoftReference so the cache may be cleared if the JVM is running low on memory.
    StreamUtils
    Utility method for working with various types of streams.
    TargetUtils  
    TokenUtils
    A set of utilities for generating/working with random tokens.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CalendarActivityRamp.RampKey
